# (PART) Tabular overview by location {#p:tabular .unnumbered}

```{r location-display, results = "asis"}
trend |>
  distinct(.data$location_group_id, .data$locationgroup) |>
  transmute(
    chapter = ifelse(
      .data$locationgroup == lag(
        as.character(.data$locationgroup), 1, default = ""
      ),
      "",
      sprintf("\n# %s\n", .data$locationgroup)
    ),
    rmd = pmap_chr(
      list(
        this_ch_title = .data$chapter, this_location = .data$location_group_id
      ),
      knit_expand, file = "_location.Rmd"
    )
  ) -> rmd
knit(text = paste(rmd$rmd, collapse = "\n\n"), quiet = TRUE) |>
  cat()
```
